overview: How do you survive in an isolated village with a small human population and a large wildlife population? For Zulu, an honorable rural man, survival is a constant battle. Although he dreams of becoming an acclaimed musician and taking care of his ailing mother; in reality, he is a broken-hearted drunk. Eventually, his anger towards life thrusts him into the arms of poachers who become his family.
title: Gonarezhou: The Movie
